Source.Name: gnupg
Source.Summary: Complete and free implementation of OpenPGP
Source.Description: GnuPG is a complete and free implementation of OpenPGP standard as defined by RFC4880. It allows encryption and signing of data and communications, a key management system, and access modules for public key directories.

Package.Name: gnupg
Package.Summary: Complete and free implementation of OpenPGP
Package.Description: GnuPG is a complete and free implementation of OpenPGP standard as defined by RFC4880. It allows encryption and signing of data and communications, a key management system, and access modules for public key directories.
